website_summaries.verdict: A well-made benchtop mortiser with a solid build that's easy to set up and use.
pros: This unit features a benchtop design that doesn't take up a lot of space but delivers powerful performance thanks to the half-horsepower motor
X-Y table is easy to use and provides excellent stability
Cast iron fence is very durable
cons: Some extremely hard woods may challenge it
Included bits aren't as durable as the machine's other components

customer_reviews.title: Good machine, but get different bits.
customer_reviews.text: I'll agree with the other reviews on this item. The machines itself is decent and the xy table is great. The bits that come with the machine are horrible. They are poorly machined and make an incredible amount of noise, don't eject well and overheat quickly. I already broke one and was using it in a very reserved manner due to my concerns about the noise and overheating.... I would buy better bits immediately. Overall I'm happy with the machine as it meets my needs for now.
customer_reviews.author: J. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: The movable table makes this special
customer_reviews.text: It does make a nice mortise, but so would several other mortisers. The hook with this is that the table is mobil and that makes making a 1 inch long mortise very easy
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Terry A. Lang

customer_reviews.title: Totally what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I seen this on the site and always wanted to get one . Now when I need to make a mortise I just walk over to my mortise machine and before I know it I'm done and moving on to the next step in the project. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Konkus Jr

customer_reviews.title: Poor Fit and Finish
customer_reviews.text: I knew enough to purchase additional chisels, mine broke on the second run. Fit and finish is poor with a lot of machine marks, will not operate smoothly, and a stripped machine bolt. Easy to set up and a fair price point. I like the X/Y feature, but I may have gone another direction had I had the chance to put my hands on this one first.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cuts Clean Mortises
customer_reviews.text: The Rikon Mortiser, 34-260 fits my needs perfectly. It's x/y adjustment, heavy cast iron fence and table holds the work very steady while the very shape drill / chisels cut very clean. Can't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ricker

customer_reviews.title: This machine works well except....
customer_reviews.text: This hollow chisel mortiser work great with the exception that the drill broke after my second use of this machine. I am waiting for a replacement now.
customer_reviews.author: konstantin

customer_reviews.title: Keep shopping...
customer_reviews.text: It does the job but could use some updates. When cutting a mortise the bit wants to hang and pull the piece up when you’re lifting the drill bit up. I have to take a mallet to beat the wood piece down and reset everything after each drill. There’s no accessory to help avoid this issue made by Rikon that I’ve seen to eliminate the problem
customer_reviews.author: Special K

customer_reviews.title: Mortiser works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: mortiser works well - easy to set up and use -= did not like the chisel/drill bits which seemed poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Richard Barcus

customer_reviews.title: The quality of stuff is not up to par
customer_reviews.text: The chisels provided with this is absolute garbage great machine but I’d rather they sell it either with better quality chisels or knock the price down and not offer it with them horrible quality control
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: It was on time
customer_reviews.text: It was an awesome buy on time and is easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Rocio Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Value for the $
customer_reviews.text: My husband was very impressed! Said it was the best on the market!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool, in spite of some packaging defects and a factory glitch with the assembly.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Joy

customer_reviews.title: Good Machine But Poor Documentation
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good machine but the documentation is very poor. If you are new to a mortiser like I was, I strongly recommend that you Google mortisers and watch a few of the videos on setting-up and using mortiser machines. There are some great ones out there. The documentation says nothing about how to make sure that the chisels are square and while it refers to spacing the chisel above the auger, neither the manual or email support is of any use in figuring out what spacing to use for hard or soft woods. There are resources out there that do that but you are left to your own devices to find them.
customer_reviews.author: Tedd A

product_meta.title: RIKON Professional Power Tools Benchtop X/Y Mortiser, 34-260
product_meta.description:
Benchtop X-Y Mortising Machine #34-260 gives precision positioning of your work for boring mortises because of the sliding, X-Y axis table. Front controls move the table either forward-and-back, or side-to-side along the dual dovetail ways. The front clamp pushes work against the cast iron rear fence, as well as acting as a hold down.


 * 1/2 HP 120 Volt TEFC Motor
 * Dovetail Column Ways with Adjustable Stop
 * Gas Filled Stabilizer
 * Includes 2 Extensions
 * 5/8″ & 3/4″ Chisel Bushings
 * Includes: Fence, Hold Down, Tool Holder and 4 Chisels
feature_bullets: BENCHTOP MORTISER - This benchtop X-Y Mortising Machine gives precision positioning of your work for boring mortises because of the sliding X-Y axis table.
POWERFUL - With powerful ½ HP Motor with 1750 RPM this motor quickly cuts mortises in the toughest woods without stalling.
CONSISTENT CUT - Use this benchtop mortiser with dovetail column ways with adjustable stop for solid, consistent cutting of multiple mortises.
STABILIZED - Feel safe with your consistent work because this benchtop has a gas filled stabilizer that helps control downward and upward chisel motion during your hard work.

CONTROL - The X - Y directional table with stops provides ultimate positioning control for boring mortises and allows you to focus on the work. For ultimate control use this Rikon benchtop mortiser for all of your needs.
